title: Mango upside down cake
ingredients: ['150g (5 oz) plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '50g (2 oz) butter', '30g (1 oz) honey', '85g (3 oz) unsalted butter, softened', '150g (5 oz) caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '175ml (6 fl oz) milk', '3 mangoes - peeled, stones removed and thinly sliced']
